test-case.sql: SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION ALL SELECT i.order_id, i.user_id FROM t_order_item i WHERE i.order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION SELECT i.order_id, i.user_id FROM t_order_item i WHERE i.order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION ALL SELECT u.user_id FROM t_user u ORDER BY user_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION ALL SELECT u.user_id FROM t_user u ORDER BY user_id FETCH NEXT 3 ROW ONLY
test-case.scenario-comments: Test select union all fetch statement when use sharding feature and federation executor engine.

test-case.sql: SELECT o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION SELECT u.user_id FROM t_user u ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order INTERSECT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? ORDER BY order_id
(SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order) INTERSECT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? ORDER BY order_id

(SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order) INTERSECT (SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? MINUS SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?) ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order EXCEPT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? INTERSECT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? ORDER BY order_id

(SELECT * FROM t_order MINUS SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?) INTERSECT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order EXCEPT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order EXCEPT (SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?) ORDER BY order_id

SELECT * FROM t_order MINUS SELECT * FROM t_order INTERSECT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? ORDER BY order_id
(SELECT * FROM t_order MINUS SELECT * FROM t_order) INTERSECT (SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?) ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order INTERSECT ALL SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT * FROM t_order INTERSECT ALL SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id FETCH NEXT 3 ROW ONLY
